trans-unit.source: Do not invoke Diagnostic.Descriptor
trans-unit.target: Do not invoke Diagnostic.Descriptor

trans-unit.source: Accessing the Descriptor property of Diagnostic in compiler layer leads to unnecessary string allocations for fields of the descriptor that are not utilized in command line compilation. Hence, you should avoid accessing the Descriptor of the compiler diagnostics here. Instead you should directly access these properties off the Diagnostic type.
trans-unit.target: Accessing the Descriptor property of Diagnostic in compiler layer leads to unnecessary string allocations for fields of the descriptor that are not utilized in command line compilation. Hence, you should avoid accessing the Descriptor of the compiler diagnostics here. Instead you should directly access these properties off the Diagnostic type.

trans-unit.source: Do not invoke property '{0}' on type '{1}', instead directly access the required member{2} on '{1}'
trans-unit.target: Do not invoke property '{0}' on type '{1}', instead directly access the required member{2} on '{1}'

trans-unit.source: SymbolDeclaredEvent must be generated for source symbols
trans-unit.target: SymbolDeclaredEvent must be generated for source symbols

trans-unit.source: Compilation event queue is required to generate symbol declared events for all declared source symbols. Hence, every source symbol type or one of its base types must generate a symbol declared event.
trans-unit.target: Compilation event queue is required to generate symbol declared events for all declared source symbols. Hence, every source symbol type or one of its base types must generate a symbol declared event.

trans-unit.source: SymbolDeclaredEvent must be generated for source symbols
trans-unit.target: SymbolDeclaredEvent must be generated for source symbols

trans-unit.source: Add public types and members to the declared API
trans-unit.target: Add public types and members to the declared API

trans-unit.source: Symbol '{0}' is not part of the declared API.
trans-unit.target: Symbol '{0}' is not part of the declared API.

trans-unit.source: All public types and members should be declared in PublicAPI.txt. This draws attention to API changes in the code reviews and source control history, and helps prevent breaking changes.
trans-unit.target: All public types and members should be declared in PublicAPI.txt. This draws attention to API changes in the code reviews and source control history, and helps prevent breaking changes.

trans-unit.source: Remove deleted types and members from the declared API
trans-unit.target: Remove deleted types and members from the declared API

trans-unit.source: Symbol '{0}' is part of the declared API, but is either not public or could not be found
trans-unit.target: Symbol '{0}' is part of the declared API, but is either not public or could not be found

trans-unit.source: When removing a public type or member the corresponding entry in PublicAPI.txt should also be removed. This draws attention to API changes in the code reviews and source control history, and helps prevent breaking changes.
trans-unit.target: When removing a public type or member the corresponding entry in PublicAPI.txt should also be removed. This draws attention to API changes in the code reviews and source control history, and helps prevent breaking changes.

trans-unit.source: Constructor makes its noninheritable base class inheritable, thereby exposing its protected members.
trans-unit.target: Constructor makes its noninheritable base class inheritable, thereby exposing its protected members.

trans-unit.target: Constructor make noninheritable base class inheritable
